name: py-lightning-utilities

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: Common Python utilities and GitHub Actions in Lightning Ecosystem

dependencies.name: py-fire
dependencies.description:
Python Fire is a library for automatically generating command line
interfaces (CLIs) with a single line of code.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-typing-extensions
dependencies.description:
The typing_extensions module contains both backports of these changes as
well as experimental types that will eventually be added to the typing
module, such as Protocol (see PEP 544 for details about protocols and
static duck typing).

dependencies.name: python-venv
dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment

dependent_to.name: py-lightning-fabric
dependent_to.description:
Fabric is the fast and lightweight way to scale PyTorch models without
boilerplate.

dependent_to.name: py-lightning
dependent_to.description: The deep learning framework to pretrain, finetune and deploy AI models.

dependent_to.name: py-lightning-lite
dependent_to.description:
LightningLite enables pure PyTorch users to scale their existing code on
any kind of device while retaining full control over their own loops and
optimization logic.

dependent_to.name: py-pytorch-lightning
dependent_to.description: PyTorch Lightning is the lightweight PyTorch wrapper for ML researchers.

dependent_to.name: py-torchmetrics
dependent_to.description: Machine learning metrics for distributed, scalable PyTorch applications.
